docs.title: Stable release
docs.text:
To install ToolCraft, run this command in your terminal:

$ pip install toolcraft

This is the preferred method to install ToolCraft, as it will always install the most recent stable release.

If you don't have pip installed, this Python installation guide can guide you through the process.

docs.title: From source
docs.text:
The source for ToolCraft can be downloaded from the Github repo.

You can either clone the public repository:

$ git clone git://github.com/SpikingNeurons/toolcraft

Or download the tarball:

$ curl -OJL https://github.com/SpikingNeurons/toolcraft/tarball/main

Once you have a copy of the source, you can install it with:

$ pip install .

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
To use ToolCraft in a project
